Type.Name: DES

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DES extends System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

Docs.summary: Abstract base class for all implementations of the Data Encryption Standard. A 64 bits (56 bits effective) symmetric cipher.
Docs.remarks: NIST FIPS PUB 46-3: Data Encryption Standard (http://csrc.nist.gov/publications/fips/fips46-3/fips46-3.pdf).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
.method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Cryptography.DES Create() cil managed

Docs.summary: Create an instance of the default implementation of DES.
Docs.returns: To be added: an object of type 'DES'
Docs.remarks: By default this will create a new instance. This can be changed by modifying the machine.config configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Cryptography.DES Create(string algName) cil managed

Docs.summary: Create an instance of the specified implementation of DES.
Docs.returns: To be added: an object of type 'DES'
Docs.remarks: New implementation can be added, or currents can be modified, by modifying the machine.config configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool IsSemiWeakKey(unsigned int8[] rgbKey) cil managed

Docs.param: The secret key to be verified.
Docs.summary: Check if the specified key is a known DES semi-weak key.
Docs.returns: True if the key is a known semi-weak key, false otherwise.
Docs.remarks: The DES implementation included in Mono won't accept a weak or semi-weak key.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool IsWeakKey(unsigned int8[] rgbKey) cil managed

Docs.param: The secret key to be verified.
Docs.summary: Check if the specified key is a known DES weak key.
Docs.returns: True if the key is a known weak key, false otherwise.
Docs.remarks: The DES implementation included in Mono won't accept a weak or semi-weak key.

MemberSignature.Value: public override byte[] Key { get; set; }
